title: Neurocognitive rehabilitation in patients with stroke

author: Alberta Lunardelli, Azienda Sanitaria Universitaria Integrata di Trieste

segmentation: So I will talk about the cognitive rehabilitation and I will start with brief description, an introduction to the basics of cognitive rehabilitation, and then I will talk about the rationale behind the protocol of memory, net and.
Of the apps and the cognitive apps we have developed.

OK, so why we are talking about cognitive rehabilitation first of all, so brain injuries like stroke or traumatic brain injury, produce a constellation of symptoms of medical consequences, not only physical motor but also emotional and cognitive impairments.
Cognitive impairments are among the most critical.
Factors that may determine the outcome of the final outcome of rehabilitation.
As such, cognitive rehabilitation represent an important an integral part of any neuro rehabilitation or brain injury rehabilitation.

I will start with some definition of what is neurohr abilitation starting from the definition by the World Health Organization and will file for organization defined as rehabilitation, which implies the restoration of patient to the highest level of physical, psychological and social adaptation.
